text: Ej farzandoni Odam, sajton sumoro nafireʙad, hamcunon ki padaru modaratonro (Odam va Havvoro) az ʙihist ʙerun rond, liʙos az tanason ʙerun kard, to sarmgohasonro ʙa onho ʙinamojonad. Hamono sajton va hampesagonas az coe, ki onhoro nameʙined, sumoro meʙinand. Hamono Mo sajtonhoro dustoni kasone qaror dodem, ki ʙa jagonagii Alloh imon nameovarand
